item.title: 全球银行争相在蓬勃发展的日本招聘顶尖人才
item.description:
在全球最紧张的劳动力市场之一，招聘人员将求职者困在房间里数小时，并通过派对来吸引他们。【原文：

In one of the world’s tightest labor markets, recruiters are cornering applicants in rooms for hours and wooing them with parties.

】

item.title: 交易员在 CPI 数据公布前押注 2025 年美联储仅减息一次
item.description: 交易员们越来越多地押注美联储今年只会降息一次，因为有迹象表明，经济增长将保持韧性，通胀将持续走高。【原文：Traders are increasingly betting that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates only once this year amid signs of resilient growth and sticky inflation.】

item.title: 新泽西州运输工程师工会投票支持新工资协议
item.description: 新泽西运输公司的机车工程师们批准了新的工资合同，该合同是在 5 月份为期三天的罢工后达成的协议，罢工导致铁路服务中断。【原文：New Jersey Transit’s locomotive engineers ratified the new wage contract which was the result of an agreement following a three-day strike that halted rail service in May.】

item.title: 阿根廷最高法院禁止基什内尔终身担任公职
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，阿根廷最高法院维持了对前总统克里斯蒂娜-费尔南德斯-德基什内尔的欺诈罪判决，批准判处她六年监禁以及终身禁止担任公职。【原文：Argentina’s Supreme Court upheld former President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner’s fraud conviction, ratifying her sentence to six years in prison as well as a lifelong ban on holding public office, according to local media.】

item.title: Ascend 将向高管支付高达 246 万美元的破产奖金
item.description: Ascend Performance Materials 公司是一家破产的工业尼龙生产商，该公司在法院的保护下努力削减债务并进行重组，因此获得了向 11 名高管支付总额高达 246 万美元奖金的许可。【原文：Ascend Performance Materials Inc., a bankrupt maker of industrial nylon, won court permission to pay 11 executives a total of as much $2.46 million in bonuses as the company works to cut debt and reorganize itself while in court protection.】

item.title: 常青住宅公司将为 VineBrook 管理 21,000 套独户住宅出租房
item.description: Evergreen Residential Holdings 正在接管 VineBrook Homes Trust Inc.【原文：Evergreen Residential Holdings is taking over management of 21,000 US rental homes owned by VineBrook Homes Trust Inc., as single-family landlords find new ways to grow at a time when acquisitions are difficult.】

item.title: 护士因薪酬协议举行罢工，加纳努力实现预算目标
item.description: 加纳要求其护士取消罢工，接受明年实施的工资协议，以保护 2025 年预算不出现意外滑坡。【原文：Ghana has asked its nurses to call off a strike and accept the implementation of a wage deal next year as it seeks to protect the 2025 budget from unplanned slippages.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行（CIBC）行长称加拿大经济在贸易战期间处于 "暂停状态
item.description: 加拿大最大的银行之一的负责人表示，加拿大的经济正处于 "悬浮状态"，主要的新投资基本上被搁置，但在未来几个月可能会开始复苏。【原文：Canada’s economy is stuck in a state of “suspended animation,” with major new investments largely on hold, but may start to recover in the coming months, according to the head of one of the country’s largest banks.】

item.title: 全食超市供应商遭黑客攻击，货架空空如也，叉车停滞不前
item.description: 亚马逊公司全食超市（Whole Foods Market）的杂货分销商联合天然食品公司（United Natural Foods Inc.【原文：United Natural Foods Inc., a grocery distributor for Amazon Inc.’s Whole Foods Market, is working to bring systems back online by June 15 and resume product deliveries after a cyberattack disrupted its operations, leaving some store shelves barren of ice cream, bread and other goods.】

item.title: 法国电力公司在核反应堆中发现应力腐蚀裂纹的迹象
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）发现有迹象表明，"应力腐蚀 "裂缝可能会再次影响一座核反应堆的管道。【原文：Electricite de France SA found indications that “stress corrosion” cracks may again affect pipes at a nuclear reactor that it fixed fewer than three years ago, risking a revival of tensions on Europe’s power and gas markets.】

item.title: 据说 ECM 集团即将宣布芯片制造供应商的首次公开募股计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国工业企业集团 ECM 集团正准备在巴黎为其子公司 Semco Technologies 首次公开募股。【原文：French industrial conglomerate ECM Group is preparing for an initial public offering in Paris for its subsidiary Semco Technologies, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞典绿色钢铁制造商酝酿首次公开募股为扩张计划融资
item.description: Stegra AB 公司正在瑞典北部建设世界上最大的绿色钢厂，该公司正在为最终的股票公开上市做前期工作，因为其扩张计划所需的资金可能会超过其私人融资能力。【原文：Stegra AB, which is building the world’s biggest green steel plant in northern Sweden, is doing initial work for an eventual public listing of shares because its expansion plans may need more funding than it can raise privately.】

item.title: 迈克尔-赛勒抨击吉姆-查诺斯呼吁做空策略
item.description: Strategy 公司的迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）驳斥了做空者吉姆-查诺斯（Jim Chanos）关于做空比特币库藏公司股票并买入加密货币的建议，因为该公司的普通股比其持有的代币价值有很大溢价。【原文：Strategy’s Michael Saylor dismissed short-seller Jim Chanos’s recommendation to short the shares of the Bitcoin treasury company and buy the cryptocurrency because of the large premium the company’s common stock commands over the value of its token holdings.】

item.title: 违约在即，EchoStar 债券持有人与 Akin Gump 律师事务所进行磋商
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，EchoStar 公司的债券持有人正在与 Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld 律师事务所合作，因为这家电信公司正在联邦通信委员会的调查中考虑申请破产。【原文：Bondholders to EchoStar Corp. are working with law firm Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld as the telecommunications company mulls a potential bankruptcy filing amid a Federal Communications Commission probe, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阳狮集团从 WPP 手中赢得价值 17 亿美元的玛氏广告客户
item.description: 阳狮集团（Publicis Groupe SA）赢得了一个重要的新客户，从 WPP Plc 手中获得了 M&Ms 和士力架所有者玛氏公司价值 17 亿美元的广告组合。【原文：Publicis Groupe SA has won a major new client, snagging the $1.7 billion ad portfolio for M&Ms and Snickers owner Mars Inc. from WPP Plc, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 南非任命橄榄球队长和商界领袖为全国对话小组成员
item.description: 南非总统成立了一个包括商界领袖、演员和国家橄榄球队队长在内的小组，以指导关于南非未来发展道路的对话。【原文：South Africa’s president set up a panel that includes business leaders, actors and the captain of its national rugby team to guide a dialogue on the country’s future development path.】

item.title: 欧洲央行斯托纳拉斯称稳定的欧盟政策吸引投资者投资欧元
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）在接受《德国商报》采访时表示，美国在关税问题上不可预测的行为正在削弱美元作为全球储备货币的地位，这对欧元来说是一个机遇。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras said the US’s unpredictable behavior on tariffs is undermining the dollar’s status as the global reserve currency and is an opportunity for the euro, according to an interview in Handelsblatt.】

item.title: 关税打击制造世贸中心尖顶的加拿大公司
item.description: 加拿大钢结构制造商 ADF 集团公司报告盈利下降，生产放缓，部分原因是美国关税带来的不确定性。【原文：ADF Group Inc., a Canadian maker of steel structures, reported lower earnings and slowed its production partly because of the uncertainty caused by US tariffs.】

item.title: 智利国务卿马泰详细介绍节约数十亿公共开支的计划
item.description: 智利总统候选人伊夫林-马特希（Evelyn Matthei）在公职人员违规休病假丑闻曝光后，提出了通过打击欺诈和整顿政府采购，每年为国库节省 15 亿美元的计划。【原文：Chile presidential candidate Evelyn Matthei laid out plans to save state coffers $1.5 billion annually by combating fraud and revamping government purchases, following a scandal over irregular medical leave by public employees.】

item.title: 数据中心促使美国将耗电量预测提高 92
item.description: 美国数据中心对电力的需求迅速增加，官方预测明年的用电量在上个月几乎翻了一番。【原文：US data centers are rapidly driving up demand for power, with the official forecast for electricity consumption next year almost doubling in the past month.】

item.title: 马斯克的技术银行家格兰姆斯出售 SpaceX 和 Anduril，以获得特朗普的职位
item.description: 曾在 2022 年帮助埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）收购 Twitter 的资深科技投资银行家迈克尔-格兰姆斯（Michael Grimes），在商务部新任职务的财务披露中报告了价值高达 9800 万美元的资产。【原文：Michael Grimes, the veteran technology investment banker who helped Elon Musk buy Twitter in 2022, reported assets worth as much as $98 million in a financial disclosure as part of his new role at the Commerce Department.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利敦促债券交易商押注通胀缓解
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的利率策略师们表示，本周将公布的通胀数据的意外下滑以及油价的下跌，都将削弱债券市场对未来两年通胀的预期。【原文：Morgan Stanley interest-rate strategists say a surprise ebb in inflation data due this week and declining oil prices stand to reel in the bond market’s expectations for inflation over the next two years.】

item.title: 贝森特成为美联储鲍威尔继任者的可能竞争者
item.description: 特朗普政府内外越来越多的顾问正在力推另一个人选担任下一任美联储主席：财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）。【原文：A growing chorus of advisers inside and outside the Trump administration are pushing another name to serve as the next chair of the Federal Reserve: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent.】

item.title: Snap 首款消费级 AR "眼镜 "将于 2026 年面世
item.description: Snap 公司计划明年推出第一副消费者增强现实眼镜，比竞争对手 Meta Platforms 公司的发布计划提前了几个月。【原文：Snap Inc. plans to launch its first consumer pair of augmented-reality glasses next year, beating a planned release from rival Meta Platforms Inc. by several months.】

item.title: S&P 抛弃布鲁克菲尔德后的低迷创造了购买机会
item.description: 新斯科舍银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）的分析师表示，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）进入 S&P 500 指数的目标已经推迟，但仍留在加拿大股票基准中，这为该公司提供了一个 "战术性买入机会"。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management’s goal of entering the S&P 500 Index while staying in the Canadian stocks benchmark has been delayed, setting up a “tactical buying opportunity,” according to analysts with Bank of Nova Scotia.】

item.title: 欧盟提议对俄罗斯燃料实施更严格的禁令，贸易商对此颇有微词
item.description: 欧盟提议禁止进口俄罗斯原油制成的石油产品，这将对燃料市场产生深远影响。【原文：A European Union proposal to ban imports of petroleum products made from Russian crude oil would have far-reaching consequences for fuel markets.】

item.title: 内华达铜矿项目获得 8.96 亿美元美国融资利息
item.description: 内华达州的一个采矿项目引起了美国进出口银行的关注，该银行表示有兴趣提供 8.96 亿美元，支持一家公司建设铜钼矿。【原文：A Nevada mining project has attracted the attention of the Export-Import Bank of the United States, which is showing interest in offering $896 million to support a company seeking to build a copper and molybdenum mine.】

item.title: 高通公司展示用于人工智能智能眼镜的新型处理器
item.description: 智能手机处理器的顶级制造商高通公司（Qualcomm Inc.【原文：Qualcomm Inc., the top maker of smartphone processors, is making a bigger push into smart glasses with low-power components that can run artificial intelligence software.】

item.title: 特朗普选中的本-布莱克寻求更多风险和私人投资者参与开发机构交易
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统出人意料地选择他来领导一个名不见经传的投资发展融资的联邦机构，他说他计划承担更多风险，吸引私人投资者参与其交易。【原文：President Donald Trump’s surprise pick to lead an obscure federal agency that invests in development finance said he plans to take on more risk and attract private investors to its deals.】

item.title: 贝莱德在旺季来临前看到了购买债券的机会
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. strategists say it’s time to buy municipal bonds as supply is ample and prices are favorable ahead of the summer.】
